title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Each of these activities help you have fun and learn about the park:           Become a Junior Ranger Junior Rangers explore, learn about, and protect national parks. You can earn your own Junior Ranger badge by completing the Theodore Roosevelt Island Junior Ranger book.           TRACK Trails Become a bird watcher or complete a scavenger hunt with adventures from the Track Trails program. You can also keep track of the miles you’ve hiked and earn fun prizes.           Become a Webranger Are you and your family planning a trip to other National Parks? Do you want to explore more of your National Parks online? Become a WebRanger.
